page.title: 14A Typical Weekend by Jason
page.content: awake at 8 o'clock and go downstairs where dad is watching T.V. I get washed and dressed about 8.30 and go to the shops for a paper,then get my breakfast .Mum gets up about 9 o'clock.About 10.30 my mum and I go shopping arriving back about 1 o'clock when she gets dinner.Afterwards my nephew and niece arrive so I go out to play with friends .I come in about 6 o'clock for tea.I wash up then watch T.V. till about midnight. On sunday dad comes in and wakes me up at 8.30.I wash and dress and go to get the paper.When I get back my mum is up. She makes breakfast.When we have all finished I go out.I play with Antony. Sometimes we play tennis,football.I go in at 2 o'clock for my dinner and come back out at 3 o'clock.I get in at 6.30 and have a bath.I have my tea at 7 o' clock and go to bed at 10.30.
